data.text:
For the New Year's first race, Special Week 
was entering the GII [America JCC].
data.processed:
<story>For the New Year's first race, Special Week 
<story>was entering the GII [America JCC].

data.text:
Here she comes! As expected, here comes the 
Derby Uma Musume, Special Week!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Here she comes! As expected, here comes the 
<story>Derby Uma Musume, Special Week!

data.text:
2 lengths, pulling away to 3 lengths, she crosses the goal! 
The Derby Uma Musume, Special Week, with a magnificent victory!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>2 lengths, pulling away to 3 lengths, she crosses the goal! 
<story>The Derby Uma Musume, Special Week, with a magnificent victory!

data.text:
Hell yeah! You did it, Spe!! 
Thanks for the excitement!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Hell yeah! You did it, Spe!! 
<story>Thanks for the excitement!

data.text:
This is the best first step towards 
the [Spring Tenno Sho] you can make!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>This is the best first step towards 
<story>the [Spring Tenno Sho] you can make!

data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: Spe-chan, congratulations on your victory♪
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Spe-chan, congratulations on your victory♪

data.text:
Yeah, yeah! Once again, 
just watching that race got my blood pumping!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, yeah! Once again, 
<story>just watching that race got my blood pumping!

data.text: Ehehe, Thanks Grass-chan and Tsuru-chan!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ehehe, Thanks Grass-chan and Tsuru-chan!

data.text:
Out of all of us, you were the 
first one to get their first Senior class win!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Out of all of us, you were the 
<story>first one to get their first Senior class win!

data.text:
Really though, Tsuru-chan should have 
been the one to run before me.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Really though, Tsuru-chan should have 
<story>been the one to run before me.

data.text: Gununu… That's right, but―
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: <story>Gununu… That's right, but―

data.text:
Last year, because I wasn't feeling well, I only got to run in 3 
races, but this year it'll be different for me!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Last year, because I wasn't feeling well, I only got to run in 3 
<story>races, but this year it'll be different for me!

data.text:
After the New Year, I'll be the first one that gets 
to run their heart out, this year for sure I'll 
get to run with Spe-chan and everyone else!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>After the New Year, I'll be the first one that gets 
<story>to run their heart out, this year for sure I'll 
<story>get to run with Spe-chan and everyone else!

data.text: Yeah! We'll definitely run together!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah! We'll definitely run together!

data.text:
Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi-san has injured her leg. 
For the time being, she'll be taking a break.
data.name: Teacher
data.processed:
<story>Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi-san has injured her leg. 
<story>For the time being, she'll be taking a break.

data.text: Ueeeeeeeh～?!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ueeeeeeeh～?!

data.text:
After my debut race my physical condition got worse, 
and I was able to recover by the fall, but I kinda 
guessed this would happen though～…
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>After my debut race my physical condition got worse, 
<story>and I was able to recover by the fall, but I kinda 
<story>guessed this would happen though～…

data.text:
But, but, but! Once this leg heals, I'll catch up 
to you in no time, so just you wait!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>But, but, but! Once this leg heals, I'll catch up 
<story>to you in no time, so just you wait!

data.text:
Tsuru-chan hasn't been able to participate in many races due to 
injuries but, her runs are quite amazing. I definitely would 
like to try running together.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Tsuru-chan hasn't been able to participate in many races due to 
<story>injuries but, her runs are quite amazing. I definitely would 
<story>like to try running together.

data.text: Yeah, someday with me, Grass-chan, and El-chan too, all together!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah, someday with me, Grass-chan, and El-chan too, all together!

data.text: Oh? In that case, should we all go to France together?
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Oh? In that case, should we all go to France together?

data.text: France…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>France…?

data.text:
Starting in Spring, El will be in France for an 
extended campaign. With her results from the [Japan 
Cup], next she wants to go overseas.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Starting in Spring, El will be in France for an 
<story>extended campaign. With her results from the [Japan 
<story>Cup], next she wants to go overseas.

data.text:
Eeeeh?! I didn't know that! 
El-chan, you're going to France?!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Eeeeh?! I didn't know that! 
<story>El-chan, you're going to France?!

data.text: Bueno! I'll show you I can even shock the whole world!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: <story>Bueno! I'll show you I can even shock the whole world!

data.text: Is that so… rather than amazing, I can't even imagine that…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Is that so… rather than amazing, I can't even imagine that…

data.text:
…But, I think it'll be a little lonely. El-chan, 
going there by yourself, won't you be lonely?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>…But, I think it'll be a little lonely. El-chan, 
<story>going there by yourself, won't you be lonely?

data.text:
Of course, If I said I wasn't lonely it'd be 
a lie, a fiction, and a fairy tale…
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>Of course, If I said I wasn't lonely it'd be 
<story>a lie, a fiction, and a fairy tale…

data.text:
… How-ev-er! More than that, 
my dream is what will pull me forward!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>… How-ev-er! More than that, 
<story>my dream is what will pull me forward!

data.text: Your dream…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Your dream…

data.text:
To prove that El is the "World's Strongest"! 
The moment I become the strongest, make sure you don't miss it!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
<story>To prove that El is the "World's Strongest"! 
<story>The moment I become the strongest, make sure you don't miss it!

data.text:
Going out in to the world to chase your 
dream! That's awesome, El-chan!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Going out in to the world to chase your 
<story>dream! That's awesome, El-chan!

data.text:
That really makes me want to work even harder! 
I want to run as soon as possible～!!!! Cough, cough!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>That really makes me want to work even harder! 
<story>I want to run as soon as possible～!!!! Cough, cough!

data.text:
Please calm down, Tsuru-chan. 
Pushing yourself is prohibited, okay?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Please calm down, Tsuru-chan. 
<story>Pushing yourself is prohibited, okay?

data.text:
However, I really understand that feeling. 
We can't lose to El either, right?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>However, I really understand that feeling. 
<story>We can't lose to El either, right?

data.text:
M-me too! I'll win the next race 
and then the [Spring Tenno Sho] after that!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>M-me too! I'll win the next race 
<story>and then the [Spring Tenno Sho] after that!

data.text: To get closer to "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>To get closer to "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

data.text:
Suzuka-san, thanks for the massage! 
Thanks to that, my legs are all squishy now!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Suzuka-san, thanks for the massage! 
<story>Thanks to that, my legs are all squishy now!

data.text:
Today's training, it seemed like you 
were working harder than usual.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Today's training, it seemed like you 
<story>were working harder than usual.

data.text:
It's because I heard that El-chan would 
be challenging herself overseas!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>It's because I heard that El-chan would 
<story>be challenging herself overseas!

data.text:
In an unfamiliar place running alone, it'll definitely be hard, 
but El-chan is challenging herself for the sake of her dream.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>In an unfamiliar place running alone, it'll definitely be hard, 
<story>but El-chan is challenging herself for the sake of her dream.

data.text:
Her feelings towards her dream are what pull her forward― 
That's why, I felt like I needed to work harder too!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Her feelings towards her dream are what pull her forward― 
<story>That's why, I felt like I needed to work harder too!

data.text:
Your feelings towards your dream pulling you forward… 
without a doubt that's the way it is.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Your feelings towards your dream pulling you forward… 
<story>without a doubt that's the way it is.

data.text: …Hey, Spe-chan.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Hey, Spe-chan.

data.text: Yeah, what do you need?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah, what do you need?

data.text:
I was thinking that I wanted to challenge 
some overseas races too.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>I was thinking that I wanted to challenge 
<story>some overseas races too.

data.text: …eh?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…eh?

data.text:
Ever since joining , I've been 
able to see so many types of "scenery".
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Ever since joining , I've been 
<story>able to see so many types of "scenery".

data.text:
While I'm running, a new "scenery" expands before me, 
and the feeling of wanting to keep running overflows…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>While I'm running, a new "scenery" expands before me, 
<story>and the feeling of wanting to keep running overflows…

data.text: Faster, further ahead― I want to keep chasing that "scenery".
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Faster, further ahead― I want to keep chasing that "scenery".

data.text: I can't seem to keep holding back these feelings, that's why…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>I can't seem to keep holding back these feelings, that's why…

data.text: Overseas… Suzuka-san is, going overseas…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Overseas… Suzuka-san is, going overseas…?

data.text: …eh?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…eh?

data.text: EEEEEEEHHHH～?!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>EEEEEEEHHHH～?!
